name: Parity Signer UI [dev]
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; font-src 'self' data:; script-src 'self' http://localhost:3030 https://localhost:3030 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src ws://127.0.0.1:* http://localhost:3030 https://localhost:3030; style-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'self' blob:; img-src 'self' data:;
